content:
Wriite a detailed 2pages review and comprehensive conceptual review on Provision of Technologies for digitalization of tax administration in sub-saharan africa

Start by defining the key terms
Then use the refeence below as a guide
PLEASE ADD INLINE REFERENCES VERY IMPORTANT
Bakibinga-Gaswaga, E., Bakibinga, S., Bakibinga, D. B. M., & Bakibinga, P. (2020). Digital technologies in the COVID-19 responses in sub-Saharan Africa: Policies, problems and promises. The Pan African Medical Journal, 35(Suppl 2).

Nguimkeu, P., & Okou, C. (2021). Leveraging digital technologies to boost productivity in the informal sector in Sub‐Saharan Africa. Review of Policy Research, 38(6), 707-731.

Okunogbe, O., & Santoro, F. (2023). Increasing Tax Collection in African Countries: The Role of Information Technology. Journal of African Economies, 32(Supplement\_1), i57-i83.

Bernad, L., Nsengiyumva, Y., Byinshi, B., Hakizimana, N., & Santoro, F. (2023). Digital Merchant Payments as a Medium of Tax Compliance.

 Iddrisu, L.J. (2023) The effects of digitalization on tax revenue mobilization in sub ..., THE EFFECTS OF DIGITALIZATION ON TAX REVENUE MOBILIZATION IN SUB-SAHARAN AFRICA.
